name: Escort Package
desc:
When this ship is within approximately %s su of a larger friendly vessel, increases this ship's maneuverability by %s, and top speed by %s. Also increases ballistic and energy weapon range by %s.

These bonuses are %s for destroyers when the nearby friendly is a capital ship.
short: Increases maneuverability, top speed, and weapon range when near larger friendly ship.
sModDesc: Frigates & Destroyers: reduces the amount of damage taken by shields by %s. No added effect for cruisers.

name: Converted Hangar
sModDesc: Increases the rate at which the fighter replacement rate recovers by %s for cruisers, and by %s for capital ships. No added effect for destroyers.

name: Makeshift Shield Generator
desc:
Installs a makeshift, inefficient shield generator on the ship. The shield emitter is locked in a forward-facing position and has a %s degree arc.

The shield generator draws much of its power from engines and reduces the ship's top speed by %s.
short: Installs basic shields on shieldless ship.

name: Missile Autoloader
desc: <tooltip created in the script due to sections/other complexity>
short: Reloads missile weapons in small missile mounts
sModDesc: Increases the post-reload cooldown to %s seconds.

name: Defensive Targeting Array
desc:
Standard fighter communication links are re-purposed to provide short-range targeting data.

Increases fighter damage to missiles and other fighters by %s, but makes the fighters unable to leave the vicinity of their ship.
short: Increases fighter PD damage, reduces fighter roam range to zero.
sModDesc: Extends range of ballistic and energy weapons of the ship's fighters by %s units.
